00019 #ifndef _FDOTOPOFEATUREPROPERTYDEFINITION_H_
00020 #define _FDOTOPOFEATUREPROPERTYDEFINITION_H_
00021 
00022 #include <FdoStd.h>
00023 #include "fdo/Schema/PropertyDefinition.h"
00024 
00025 /// \brief
00026 /// FdoTopoFeaturePropertyDefinition derives from FdoPropertyDefinition and its
00027 /// values can be used to relate topological primitives to one or more
00028 /// application domain features. One can use the short form "TopoFeature" to
00029 /// refer to these properties. The semantics of this property are similar to
00030 /// Object properties. One uses FdoIFeatureReader::GetObject() to retrieve
00031 /// values.
00032 /// \note
00033 /// This Help topic is provided for informational use only. There is
00034 /// no interface or support provided. Autodesk reserves the right to change
00035 /// the software related to the content herein.
00036 /// \remarks
00037 /// FdoTopoFeaturePropertyDefinition and FdoTopoGeometryPropertyDefinition are
00038 /// the matching roles of many:many relationships between topological primitives
00039 /// and application domain features. FDO Association properties are not used for
00040 /// these roles because topological relationships are not between fixed classes.
00041 /// The relationships are populated only from the TopoGeometry role, so
00042 /// TopoFeature properties need never be subject to an insertion or update
00043 /// operation. 
00044 class FdoTopoFeaturePropertyDefinition : public FdoPropertyDefinition
00045 {
00046 public:
00047 
00048     /// \brief
00049     /// Constructs an instance of an FdoTopoFeaturePropertyDefinition using the
00050     /// specified arguments.
00051     /// 
00052     FDO_API static FdoTopoFeaturePropertyDefinition * Create(
00053         GisString * name, 
00054         GisString * description,
00055         bool        system = false
00056     );
00057 
00058 /// \cond DOXYGEN-IGNORE
00059     /// Public non-API functions for XML support
00060 
00061     /// Initialize the class from its XML attributes
00062     virtual void InitFromXml(const GisString* classTypeName, FdoSchemaXmlContext* pContext, GisXmlAttributeCollection* attrs);
00063     virtual void InitFromXml(FdoSchemaXmlContext* pContext, GisXmlAttributeCollection* attrs);
00064 
00065     /// Handle sub-elements such as properties
00066     /// Element start
00067     virtual GisXmlSaxHandler* XmlStartElement(
00068         GisXmlSaxContext* context, 
00069         GisString* uri, 
00070         GisString* name, 
00071         GisString* qname, 
00072         GisXmlAttributeCollection* atts
00073     );
00074     /// Element end
00075     virtual GisBoolean XmlEndElement(
00076         GisXmlSaxContext* context, 
00077         GisString* uri, 
00078         GisString* name, 
00079         GisString* qname
00080     );
00081 
00082     /// Serialize this class to XML.
00083     virtual void _writeXml( FdoSchemaXmlContext* pContext );
00084 
00085 protected:
00086     /// \brief
00087     /// Dispose this object.
00088     /// 
00089     /// \return
00090     /// Returns nothing
00091     /// 
00092     virtual void Dispose ();
00093  
00094     /// Hide default constructor to ensure that it cannot be used.
00095     FdoTopoFeaturePropertyDefinition() {};
00096     virtual ~FdoTopoFeaturePropertyDefinition() {};
00097 
00098     /// FdoFeatureSchema::RejectChanges() support
00099     virtual void    _StartChanges();
00100     virtual void    _BeginChangeProcessing();
00101     virtual void    _AcceptChanges();
00102     virtual void    _RejectChanges();
00103     virtual void    _EndChangeProcessing();
00104 /// \endcond
00105 };
